contribution_desc:
A multi-device (smartphone-tablet) AR game where the smartphone serves as a visualization portal (magic lens) and as a remote control through a mid-air waving gesture. I don't know if I should trash this, or add it to our analysis. 

Contribution: "cross-device" -> "application" -> "game".
device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
